title: Chocolate is what you need to cure that pesky cough, says study
text: Chocolate is what you need to cure that pesky cough, says study Independent.ie It turns out that chocolate might be key to curing your pesky cough, according to a new study. http://www.independent.ie/life/health-wellbeing/chocolate-is-what-you-need-to-cure-that-pesky-cough-says-study-35362141.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35362230.ece/2de8d/AUTOCROP/h342/103332974.jpg Chocolate is what you need to cure that pesky cough, says study. Image: Getty It turns out that chocolate might be key to curing your pesky cough, according to a new study.
